Correlations.descr: A boolean value to specify whether or not to include white-noise correlations
Correlations.name: Include Correlations

Detectors.descr: Number of detector realizations in the Monte Carlo simulation
Detectors.name: Detector Realizations

Experiments.descr: Number of experiment realizations in the Monte Carlo simulation
Experiments.name: Experiment Realizations

Foregrounds.descr: A boolean value to specify whether or not to include foregrounds
Foregrounds.name: Include Foregrounds

Observations.descr: Number of observation realizations in the Monte Carlo simulation
Observations.name: Observation Realizations

Percentile Hi.descr: High percentile to display on output parameter distributions
Percentile Hi.name: Calculated High Percentiles

Percentile Lo.descr: Low percentile to display on output parameter distributions
Percentile Lo.name: Calculated Low Percentiles

Resolution.descr: Frequency resolution used for the simulation
Resolution.name: Frequency Resolution
